law_name: Pakistan Medical and Dental Council Ordinance

sections.body: This Ordinance may be called the Pakistan Medical and Dental Council Ordinance, 1962. It extends to the whole of Pakistan. It shall come into force at once.

In this Ordinance, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or context, various definitions are provided for terms such as 'approved hospital or institution', 'Council', 'continuous professional development', etc.

sections.section_title: Constitution and composition of the Council
sections.body: The Federal Government shall constitute a Council consisting of various members including representatives from the Senate, National Assembly, and medical faculties.
Elections under specified clauses shall be conducted by the Council as may be prescribed.
Eligibility criteria for nominations and elections are outlined, including requirements for registered medical practitioners and dentists.
The Council shall be incorporated as a body corporate.
Details regarding the terms of office for members of the Council.
Provisions regarding the meetings of the Council.

sections.section_title: Officers, Committees and servants of the Council
sections.body: Details regarding the officers and committees of the Council.
